oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Delta Queen steamboat on a river voyage, n.d.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The American sternwheel steamboat “Delta Queen,” pictured on a river voyage. Historically, she has been used for cruising the major rivers that constitute the tributaries of the Mississippi River, particularly in the American South. Forms part of the Bill Goodman Photographic Slides Collection. 1 35 mm negative.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Delta Queen (Steamboat)
